title: Chief Starr and the Raiders of the Galaxy
featuredTitle: Chief Starr and the Raiders of the Galaxy
description: Chief Starr is transporting precious cargo: the Mayor of space and his daughters, Princess Meridian and Scorpio 9. After an attack separates them, he must search the galaxy to find them before Lord Dracula does.
starring: Ben Chang, Jeff Winger, Britta Perry, Annie Edison, Garrett Lambert, Leonard Rodriguez
altHero: Chief Starr in a suit at his spaceship desk
alt1: Princess Meridian with the Mayor of space, a man in a billowy blouse with white hair and eyebrows
alt2: the Minotaur, a man in a homemade robot costume, third eye on his forehead, and fake horns
alt3: an older man wearing a cap and bandana, a black triangle drawn on his forehead and a tear falling from his eye
alt4: Chief Starr, the Mayor, and a CG alien with boxing gloves in a fiery hell
